summary: Adds new house new white run with npc selling items to create Ice spike,firball and shock  Projectiles for Crossbows.
descriptionHtml:
[u]I'm planning on adding Shouts and other Spells and Projectile too![/u]


I thought it would be cool to shoot some Spells with a Crossbow so i made this mod.


[u]Features:
[/u]-Adds a new building outside of Whiterun Map Marker called Arcane Inventions Hall
-Inside is a Merchant that sells Items needed to craft these Bolts
-Merchant sells Custom Potion these are quite powerfull
-Furniture: Enchanting table, Alchemie Lab with container holds 100 of each ingredient
-Arcane Anvil to craft the Bolts and two dwemer Crossbows one uses Destruction Skill
-Chests are usable to store items
-2 Beds
-The inn is owned by Player

[u]Issues:
[/u]-The Bloodskal Blade Energy waves are Buged pass through walls, enemies and deal no damage.
Â  hopefully i can figure this out some day or some else knows how
-The Crossbows cant be used by NPCs without [u]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/u], because of a bug Dwemer Crossbows are not usable by NPCs USP fixes this.

[u]Recommended Mods
[/u]- Unofficial Skyrim patch
author: Saintwambo
